content: welcome to **fruity friends** a fabulous fruit bowl full of all your favourites these little knitted amigurumi come from the super talented amanda berry and they re so cute make them for your children grandchildren local preschool or primary school - or just to fill a comedy fruitbowl for your kitchen they all use paintbox yarns simply dk yarn so they are so affordable to make for children you must ensure safety eyes are used better still just embroider eyes to avoid choking hazards download the pdf pattern for ***fruity friends - free toy knitting pattern for kids in paintbox yarns simply dk*** & start knitting today **sizes ** apple cherries orange 3 5in/9cm banana 7 5in/19cm blueberry 1in/2 5cm x 0 75in/2cm single cherry 1 5in/4cm grapes 3 5in/9cm x 6in/15cm lemon 5 5in/14cm pear 5 125in/13cm pineapple 8 25in/21cm watermelon slice 6in/15cm x 4in/10cm
